item.title: The Marauding Elephant Network
item.description:
Farmers near Mount Kenya Forest in Africa are constantly on edge due to the threat of elephant attacks. These attacks can happen unexpectedly, putting crops, livestock, and even human lives at risk. This conflict stems from the age-old struggle between humans and nature. Humanity’s relentless pursuit of expansion has pushed many species to the brink of extinction. As a result, we are only now beginning to grasp the understanding that destroying nature ultimately harms us all...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-marauding-elephant-network/
